name: Car Drift Extreme Racing
description:
Do you like high-quality races and simulators? It's time to leave your smoking trails on the asphalt! Install Car Drift Extreme Racing right now! We wish you a pleasant game, and good luck on the tracks of Car Drift Extreme Racing!

- Car Drift Extreme Racing will give you a unique experience of driving sports cars with an intuitive control
- If you love to ride sideways, get ready to give yourself up to this game and have fun


- Win Drift and Earn Coins
- Squeeze the handbrake to put the car into a skid
- Unlock many sports cars and new tracks
- Draw asphalt, burning rubber
- Drive on the roads in thick smoke clubs
- Realistic 3D-graphics.
- Get driving experience of powerful sports cars
- Drive on highly detailed tracks
- Estimate that cars behave realistically on all surfaces - asphalt, sand, grass
- The mood of self-control
- Enjoy live cameras and spectacular replays
- Body color and car disks


REAL SOUND OF MOTORS AND TURBINES

- Real sounds for each machine
- Sounds of turbines and bypass valves
